mapper.sql: ID, Name, AddTime, EndTime, Referee, Address, PushTime, AIRport
mapper.insert: insert into exam (ID, Name, AddTime, EndTime, Referee, Address, PushTime, AIRport) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{referee,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pushtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{airport,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update exam
Name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AddTime = #{addtime,jdbcType=DATE},
EndTime = #{endtime,jdbcType=DATE},
Referee = #{referee,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PushTime = #{pushtime,jdbcType=DATE},
AIRport = #{airport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
